Select Archive Location

Use the Select Archive Location dialog box ( File | Properties | New Archive Location browse button) to select an archive location for an existing project or project database. Note that changing the archive location for an existing project or project database does not have an effect on existing archives--only newly created archives will be placed in the new location.

Field Descriptions

Look in Select a valid drive or path. The contents of the drive or path you select appear in the contents list.
Contents list Double-click to select a directory to contain the archives for the project or project database. The list displays the directories in the drive or folder selected in the Look in field. Selecting a directory updates the Look in and Folder name fields to reflect the full path name of new location.
Opens the directory one level above the current level. This button is disabled if you are at the top level of a directory.
Creates a new folder in the currently selected directory. You may rename the new folder using in-place editing. The following characters are not allowed in new folder names: \ / : * ? " < > | .
Folder name Use the Look in and Contents list fields to select and display a folder name or enter a path to the directory where you want to locate new archives.
